snippet.title: Sniper Elite VR - What is Sniper Elite VR? | PSVR, Oculus, Steam VR
snippet.description:
Sign-up for the latest news at http://reb.to/SniperEliteVRGameNews

A dedicated VR stealth-action experience from the makers of Battlezone and the BAFTA-nominated Sniper Elite 4, in collaboration with Just Add Water.

Fight for the Italian Resistance in a daring mission to rid World War 2 Sicily of the Nazi U-boat menace.

Experience a brand-new Sniper Elite game featuring an authentic first-person view, an explosive campaign and immersive motion controls.

• A brand new Sniper Elite campaign set in WW2 Italy
• Exclusive first-person gameplay - a series first
• Free movement across levels packed with tactical possibilities
• Visceral X-ray kill camera designed for VR
• Interact with authentic WW2 weapons
• PlayStation Aim and PlayStation Move controller support

For more information visit http://reb.to/SniperEliteVRGame

No longer supported on Vive Port.

Follow us on:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official/
Mixer: https://mixer.com/rebellion_official 
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/sniperelitegame/ 
Twitter https://twitter.com/SniperElite  
Rebellion Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion 
Rebellion Game Store: https://games.rebellionstore.com/
